#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,a[51],b[50],i,j,l,sum;
	
	while(cin>>n)
	{
		if(n==0)
			break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>a[i];

			
		sort(a,a+n);
		j=n/2-1;
		l=n-1;
		for(i=0;j>=0;)
		{
			b[i]=a[j];
			b[i+1]=a[l];
			i=i+2;
			j--;
			l--;
			
		}
		b[i]=a[n/2];
		sum=0;
	
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			sum+=abs(b[i]-b[i-1]);
		}
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
	}

	return 0;
}
